title: How to Make a Chocolate Chip Log

steps.headline: Open the can of fruit salad.
steps.description: Drain the juice into a separate bowl.

steps.headline: Dip a biscuit/cookie into the juice.
steps.description: Follow with another one. Press the two biscuits/cookies together and place on the plate.

steps.headline: Repeat with the remaining biscuits/cookies.
steps.description: Press each pair against the last pair to form a roll or log.

steps.headline: Spread the whipped cream over the log.
steps.description: Use a spatula or butter knife to completely cover the portion of the log you can see.

steps.headline: Sprinkle with chocolate chips to cover.
Place in the refrigerator to set.
steps.description: This should be for at least an hour.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Arrange the separated fruit salad pieces around the log before serving.

text: Open the can of fruit salad. Drain the juice into a separate bowl. Dip a biscuit/cookie into the juice. Follow with another one. Press the two biscuits/cookies together and place on the plate. Repeat with the remaining biscuits/cookies. Press each pair against the last pair to form a roll or log. Spread the whipped cream over the log. Use a spatula or butter knife to completely cover the portion of the log you can see. Sprinkle with chocolate chips to cover.  Place in the refrigerator to set. This should be for at least an hour. Serve. Arrange the separated fruit salad pieces around the log before serving.
